txt.en: Hurákh can be found at Kamaz-kala.\n\nYou should find and defeat Hurákh at Kamaz-kala.
Hurákh can be found at Kamaz-kala.\n\nYou should find and defeat Hurákh at Kamaz-kala.
Find and defeat the strange Orc leading Azog's forces at Kamaz-kala

Although the thrug-hai have proven fearsome foes at Azanulbizar, you have triumphed over Hurákh and helped make clear the way to the gates of Khazad-dûm. Without such a strong defence at the edge of the dale, Azog's advantage is lost.
With a jagged scimitar in hand, Hurákh keeps watch high above Khur Azan
One of Azog's thrug-hai, Hurákh, leads the forces at Kamaz-kala, hindering the Haban'akkâ from entering Azanulbizar.

At the very edge of Azanulbizar, the Orkish fort of Kamaz-kala guards the border of Azog's realm. It is rumoured that Hurákh, one of the thrug-hai and Azog's personal guard, leads the Orcs of Kamaz-kala and spurs them into battle against the Haban'akkâ.\n\nYou should find and defeat Hurákh at Kamaz-kala.
Though far hardier than most Orcs, you manage to defeat Hurákh!
Find and defeat Hurákh at Kamaz-kala
